body_html:
torch.Tensor does document these methods, but there isn't a formal organization (or a side-bar).
I'm saying that if we want to improve discoverability, we probably want to do either of those.
However, that will break the alphabetical-orderness of the current method list

body:
`torch.Tensor` does document these methods, but there isn't a formal organization (or a side-bar).
I'm saying that if we want to improve discoverability, we probably want to do either of those.
However, that will break the alphabetical-orderness of the current method list
